subject.topic: Murphy J. Foster Hall (Baton Rouge, La. - 1901-1923)
Louisiana State University Hospital (Baton Rouge, La.)

mods.abstract: Campus grounds, with south side of Hospital in foreground and Foster Hall in background. Title from back. Handwritten on back of duplicate image- Foster Hall - Dormitory - 1901 Louisiana State University.
